item.title: Trump's defence nominee hits out after reports he could be dropped
item.description: US media suggest the president-elect could replace Pete Hegseth, whose selection is under intense scrutiny.

item.title: Guinness supplies being limited after demand soars
item.description: Guinness-maker Diageo has placed limits on wholesale distribution of the stout to pubs in Great Britain after "exceptional demand"

item.title: Georgian opposition leader dragged from party offices by police
item.description: The prime minister had earlier vowed that the organisers of a week of pro-EU protests would face justice.

item.title: Unknown flu-like disease kills at least 79 people in DR Congo
item.description: Authorities say those infected have symptoms including headaches, fever and a runny nose.

item.title: South Korea opposition files motion to impeach President Yoon
item.description: The country faces an uncertain future after its leader Yoon Suk Yeol suddenly declared and then reversed martial law.
